paper.title: The California Planet Survey. III. A Possible 2:1 Resonance in the Exoplanetary Triple System HD 37124

paper.title: The HARPS search for southern extra-solar planets. XXVIII. Up to seven planets orbiting HD 10180: probing the architecture of low-mass planetary systems
